SELECT CASE WHEN substring(help_num,1,6) = DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(),'%y%m%d') THEN CONCAT(substring(help_num,1,6),LPAD(CONVERT(SUBSTRING(help_num,7,4), SIGNED INTEGER) + 1,4,'0')) ELSE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(),'%y%m%d'),'0001') END as help_num from (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(help_num),DATE_FORMAT(DATE(sysdate()),'%y%m%d')) as help_num FROM help) a
insert into help(help_num,help_pstn_dttm,cat_num,cnsr_num,title,exec_loc,price,pref_suppl_num,pref_help_exec_dttm,help_aply_cls_dttm,cont,exec_sgg_name) values (#{helpNum}, #{helpPstnDttm}, #{catNum}, #{cnsrNum}, #{title}, #{execLoc}, #{price}, #{prefSupplNum}, #{prefHelpExecDttm}, #{helpAplyClsDttm}, #{cont}, #{execSggName})
